artview.scripts.standard¶

artview.scripts.standard(DirIn=None, filename=None, field=None)[source]¶

standard artview execution

It has Menu with LinkSharedVariables,

2 RadarDisplay,

graphical start for:
  • All plugins
  • RadarDisplay
  • LinkSharedVariables
  • SelectRegion
